question: 賛成する
sourceAnswer: To Agree, To Approve, To Support
activeAnswer: To Agree, To Approve, To Support
sourceMnemonic: The <ja>賛成</ja> portion means "agreement", "approval", or "support", so the verb version would also be <vocabulary>to agree</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>to approve</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>to support</vocabulary>!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
